name: Devaluated
description:
Devaluated is a LudemDare 44 game! 

Controls

W: Move Down

A: Left

S: Move Up

D: Move Right

You can invert the controls before playing in the options menu.

Concept

The theme for the jam was "Your life is currency".

The game consists in collecting as much money as you can to try to stop the devaluation of your currency, but be careful!! Don't crash or the economy will suffer!

Also, stay away from the crows.
